wikipedia_page.main: Neil Metcalfe from Leeds is a former international standard competitive swimmer. Metcalfe is a silver medalist from the 1990 Commonwealth Games in Auckland. He remains one of only a handful of UK swimmers to complete the 50-metre-long course in under 23 seconds.
